text: White trillium is a common name for Trillium grandiflorum, a flowering plant native to North America. White trillium may also refer to: * Trillium flexipes, a flowering plant native to eastern North America * Trillium ovatum, a flowering plant native to western North America * Trillium simile, a flowering plant native to the southern Appalachian Mountains in southeastern United States
title: White trillium (disambiguation)
